title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) per capita in South Sudan 2024
yAxis: GDP per capita in U.S. dollars
summary: Overall GDP per capita in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
GDP per capita in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2020 to 2021, gradually increasing from 2021 to 2022, and lastly roughly constant from 2022 to 2024.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2021 and 2022.
Maximum GDP per capita in U.S. dollars, about 278.36 was reported at Year 2022
Minimum GDP per capita in U.S. dollars about 243.27 was reached at Year 2020

mid_summary: In general GDP per capita in U.S. dollars has stayed the same over the Year.
